mcext: Writing data for hacking stem experiments
mcext.agentAnalyze: Check for any hazards in a direction
mcext.agentAnalyze|param|dir: the direction to check for hazards
mcext.agentDestroyL4: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
mcext.agentDestroyL4|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
mcext.agentDestroyL5: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
mcext.agentDestroyL5|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
mcext.agentDestroyL6: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
mcext.agentDestroyL6|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
mcext.agentDetectDryBrush: Detects if there is dry brush next to the agent in the specified direction
mcext.agentDetectDryBrush|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry brush
mcext.agentDetectDryFern: Detects if there is a dry fern next to the agent in the specified direction
mcext.agentDetectDryFern|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry fern
mcext.agentDetectDryGrass: Detects if there is dry grass next to the agent in the specified direction
mcext.agentDetectDryGrass|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry grass
mcext.agentLookForHazards: Agent watches the monitor for hazards
mcext.agentSeeHazard: Sees that there is a hazard on the monitor
mcext.alertTeam: Warns the team of a high-risk area
mcext.hazardsRemainL4: Checks that there are fire hazards
mcext.hazardsRemainL5: Checks that there are fire hazards
mcext.hazardsRemainL6: Checks that there are fire hazards
